name: ShotBot
description:
ShotBot is a 1v1 multiplayer LAN game where the players play as Shotbots, artificial intelligence robots whose sole objective is to “collect as much trash as you can” as you fight off other robots from collecting your beautiful trash. Players suck up trash with a vacuum and use it to take out other players by firing it back at them in the alloted time, all to ensure you end the game with the most trash.

Also try out Solo Mode! See how much trash you can collect as fast as you can!

CONTROLS:

WASD -- Move

Q and E -- Rotate Camera

Mouse -- Look Direction

Scroll Wheel -- Zoom Camera

Left Click -- Vacuum

Right Click -- Shoot Trash (Costs 50 Trash)
